GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/:articles_id.description: return a single article object with given id

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:articles_id/comments.description: returns an array of comments for a given article

commments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
commments.author: butter_bridge

commments.body: The owls are not what they seem.
commments.author: icellusedkars

POST /api/articles/:articles_id/comments.description: posts a new comment and returns it to the client

comment.body: I don't know about you, but I am a fan of lurking.
comment.author: lurker

PATCH /api/articles/:articles_id.description: increments/decrements the vote property of a specific article and returns the updated article to the client
